name: CandidaSpeciesTestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Candida species (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Candida species),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Candida species culture or isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
